name: Paro, Inc.
description: Operator of artificial intelligence (AI)-powered marketplace intended to connect finance and accounting freelance professionals with companies. The company's platform matches businesses of all sizes and industries with highly vetted finance experts, Chief Financial Officers (CFOs), Certified Public Accountants (CPAs), and bookkeepers who have the domain expertise to tackle industry and company-specific problems on demand, enabling businesses to access the tools and insights they need to manage and grow their books of business.
